name: DisDance
description:
This is an entry for SPAJAM 2020 made under 24 hours.

Imagining dancing with your friend on a phone screen with your fingers.
This game is designed to be enjoyed with your close ones on a smartphone as a co-op rhythm game.

Accompanied by relaxing music and graphics, one player will lead the dance and the other shall follow.

  • The leader is free to take steps at his own peace.
  • Similar to real dancing, the following role is to mirror the same footwork.
  • There's no strict restrictions on how to dance and no fail states either.

After the pandemic is over, we hope this game can help you restore the trust and intimacy with your friends, family and loved ones. We wish you all the best.

このゲームは24時間内に作られたSPAJAM2020の予選エントリーです。

コンセプトはスマホの上で２人の指が踊りだす協力型音ゲーム。

  • 二人で同じリズムを奏でよう！一定回数上手く踊れるとゲームクリア！
  • リード役のプレイヤーが自由にリズムを刻み、
  • フォロー役のプレイヤーが相手のリズムを真似して踊る。

このゲームの目的はコロナで離された二人の距離を修復し、信頼関係の取り戻しに手伝いすること。

P.S. an Android build may be released soon.　

         Androidバージョンも公開予定です。
